configuration.name: widget_02159327804134339
configuration.stem: Order the statements to show the sequence of events that occurs when organ systems work together in a plant.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Which organ system takes in water and nutrients from the soil?
feedBack.finalWrongHint: The root system takes in water and nutrients from the soil. These materials enter the shoot system, which delivers them to all parts of the plant. The leaves are able to produce food for the entire plant with the water and nutrients they receive from the root system.

options.ddoText: The leaves use the water and nutrients to make food for the plant.
Water and nutrients enter the shoot system from the root system.
The root system takes in water and nutrients from the soil.
The shoot system delivers water and nutrients to all parts of the plant.
